desc_html.CN: 缓解便秘、缓解腹泻、改善IBS、调节肠道菌群、促进规律排便、预防肠道损伤、蛋白吸收、护胃清幽
desc_html.EN: Constipation & diarrhea relief, IBS support, gut microbiota modulation, bowel regularity, intestinal protection, protein absorption, gastric & H. pylori support

desc_html.CN: 体重管理、控制纤体、改善肥胖、调节血糖、改善代谢综合征、糖代谢调节、解酒护肝、减轻酒精性肝损伤、降尿酸
desc_html.EN: Weight management, obesity support, blood glucose regulation, metabolic syndrome support, alcohol metabolism & liver support, uric acid reduction

desc_html.CN: 缓解湿疹、成人过敏、儿童过敏、改善病毒性肺炎
desc_html.EN: Eczema relief, adult & pediatric allergy support, viral respiratory health

desc_html.CN: 卵巢健康、改善妇科疾病、阴道炎症、改善妊娠糖尿病、生殖健康
desc_html.EN: Ovarian health, gynecological balance, vaginal health, gestational diabetes support, reproductive health

desc_html.CN: 刨腹产儿童菌群调节、婴幼儿免疫健康、生长发育
desc_html.EN: Gut microbiota support for C-section infants, immune development, growth & development

desc_html.CN: 助眠舒压、缓解焦虑、改善ADHD、缓解帕金森、脑肠轴健康
desc_html.EN: Sleep & stress support, anxiety relief, ADHD support, Parkinson’s-related gut–brain axis support

desc_html.CN: 改善口腔菌群、改善口臭、改善牙龈炎
desc_html.EN: Oral microbiota balance, halitosis relief, gingival health support

benefit.CN: 调节阴道微生态，改善阴道炎相关问题，支持激素与代谢稳态并促进女性身心健康
